meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sottish.
meanings.sent1: Her sottishness was evident in her slurred speech and unsteady gait.
meanings.sent2: His sottishness often led him to make poor decisions when drinking.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sottishness, he managed to maintain a sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The sottishness of the situation was like a heavy fog clouding his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The sottishness of the party was unforgettable, with laughter and stumbling aplenty.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a sot.
meanings.sent1: The sottishness of his actions at the bar raised concerns among his friends.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but notice the sottishness in his loud and boisterous behavior.
meanings.sent3: His sottishness at the party was both amusing and concerning to those around him.
meanings.sent4: The sottishness of his behavior was like a neon sign flashing 'drunk'.
meanings.sent5: The sottishness of his personality made him the life of the party, for better or worse.
